main event: Multiple civilian and USAF pilot sightings of unidentified flying objects over Hawaii in December 1950.
interesting points: The civilian sighting involved three UFOs that were observed maneuvering like fighter aircraft at an altitude of 6,000 feet.
The USAF pilot sighted an orange, flame-trailing object moving over 300 mph at an altitude of approximately 8,000 feet.
The civilian UFOs were described as being 180 feet in diameter.
The civilian sighting lasted for about 10 minutes, while the USAF pilot sighting lasted 30-45 seconds.
Both sightings involved objects that maneuvered like fighter aircraft.
sighted object: three glowing orbs in the sky, orange flame-trailing object
